snippet: A runaway oil tanker truck exploded in a crowded bus station in Nigeria’s south, setting 12 buses ablaze and killing 69 people.
abstract: Nigeria's Red Cross reports 69 people dead and about 30 injured after oil tanker truck crashes into bus station and explodes.
lead_paragraph: A runaway oil tanker truck exploded in a crowded bus station in Nigeria’s south, setting 12 buses ablaze and killing 69 people.

headline.main: Nigeria: Scores Killed as Oil Tanker Crashes Into a Packed Bus Station
headline.print_headline: Africa; Nigeria: Scores Killed as Oil Truck Crashes Into a Packed Bus Station
